front.title: IEEE Standard Specification Format Guide and Test Procedure for Single-Axis Interferometric Fiber Optic Gyros -- Corrigendum 1: Figure 1 and Subclauses 5.3.4, 8.3, 12.11.4.3.2, 12.11.4.3.3, 12.11.4.3.4, 12.12.3.1, and 12.12.4.1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Errors identified in IEEE Std 952-1997 are corrected in this corrigendum. Corrections are made to Figure 1 and in subclauses 5.3.4, 8.3, 12.11.4.3.2, 12.11.4.3.3, 12.11.4.3.4, 12.12.3.1, and 12.12.4.1.
